results.title: Afghanistan Collapse Accelerates as the Taliban Capture 3 Vital Cities
results.abstract: Kandahar, Lashkar Gah and Herat have now fallen to the insurgents, who are racing to seize control of the entire country.

results.title: Sicily Registers Record-High Temperature as Heat Wave Sweeps Italian Island
results.abstract: A monitoring station on the island reported a temperature of 119.84 Fahrenheit, 48.8 degrees Celsius, on Wednesday. If verified, it would be the highest ever recorded in Europe.

results.title: New York’s incoming governor faces difficult decisions as virus cases rise.
results.abstract: Kathy Hochul puts vaccines at the top of her list and pledges to work to persuade New Yorkers reluctant to get a shot that their cooperation is vital to public health.
results.byline: By Joseph Goldstein and Ashley Wong

multimedia.caption: Kathy Hochul, the lieutenant governor who will succeed Andrew M. Cuomo once his resignation goes into effect, speaking at the State Capitol in Albany on Wednesday.
multimedia.copyright: Gabriela Bhaskar/The New York Times
